info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 12:37PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern El Paso County through 130 PM MDT... At 1237 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gleneagle, or 14 miles north of Colorado Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Black Forest around 1250 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
